name: Ricotta, Olive oil Bread with a hint of Carom seeds
description: Ricotta, Olive oil Bread is tasty and full of flavor for a fresh change to a store bought loaf.
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup herbed olive oil or plain olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the water and add the yeast and sugar to it and mix well. Let sit for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm the water and add the yeast and sugar to it and mix well. Let sit for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease the mixer bowl and add the dry ingredients. Give them a good mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease the mixer bowl and add the dry ingredients. Give them a good mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cheese, egg, butter and oil and the yeast mixture and knead for about 8 minutes in batches or 2-3 minutes. Or knead by hand for the same amount of time till a nice soft non sticky dough is formed. Add more flour or water if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cheese, egg, butter and oil and the yeast mixture and knead for about 8 minutes in batches or 2-3 minutes. Or knead by hand for the same amount of time till a nice soft non sticky dough is formed. Add more flour or water if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in well oiled container. Spray cooking oil on its top and cover with plastic wrap.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in well oiled container. Spray cooking oil on its top and cover with plastic wrap.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it rise for an hour in a warm place.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it rise for an hour in a warm place.

recipeInstructions.text: Punch the dough down and knead for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch the dough down and knead for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Make a loaf out of it by pulling on all sides and tucking it under.
recipeInstructions.name: Make a loaf out of it by pulling on all sides and tucking it under.

recipeInstructions.text: Place tucked side down in bread pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Place tucked side down in bread pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in pre-heated oven at 365 degree F  / 170ºc for 40 minutes or until nicely brown on the top.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in pre-heated oven at 365 degree F  / 170ºc for 40 minutes or until nicely brown on the top.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool completely before slicing. I usually slice it after keeping it in the refrigerator for a few hours for nice and clean slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool completely before slicing. I usually slice it after keeping it in the refrigerator for a few hours for nice and clean slices.

keywords: olive oil bread, vegan bread recipe
